text: @DesignationSix My theory has been since before the lockdown. As follow: President Trump will, (NOT), come down with coronavirus in WH. This is my prediction 🤷🏻‍♀️ then he will pas on, (NOT)! He and his NOT corrupt family in their grief move to let’s say🤔🤔🤔 au YES RUSSIA😉✌️
